definition[0]: receiving special attention, help, or treatment, sometimes in an unfair way
example[1]: Chinaâ€™s most-favored-nation trading status with the US
definition[1]: chosen or preferred by many people
example[2]: Brittany is a favoured holiday destination for families.
definition[2]: a favoured team, player etc is one that is expected to win
example[3]: Silva is favoured to win a medal in the marathon.
example[4]: a house in a favoured position on a hill
